Elemento 2.4.9
  1. org.jboss.elemento.intl
  2. RelativeTimeFormatOptions

Uses of Interface
org.jboss.elemento.intl.RelativeTimeFormatOptions

Packages that use RelativeTimeFormatOptions
Package
Description
org.jboss.elemento.intl
Provides type-safe Java mappings for the JavaScript Intl API, enabling locale-aware formatting of dates, times, numbers, lists, durations, and relative times.

  • Uses of RelativeTimeFormatOptions in org.jboss.elemento.intl
